data.name: SR_toolTipTitleItem4Text
data.value: Define the allowed optional default types.

data.name: SR_toolTipTitleItem5Text
data.value: Defines the file name pattern for non-neutral languages.

data.name: SR_toolTipTitleItem6Text
data.value: Defines the file name pattern for the neutral language.

data.name: SR_toolTipItem4Text
data.value:
Define a semicolon separated list of optional default types that can be used for the "[optionaldefaulttypes]" placeholder.
The default types will be ignores during file type parsing for generating new files and language detection.
E.g. ".aspx;.ascx;.asmx;.master"
Always include the dot for each type.

data.name: SR_toolTipItem5Text
data.value:
Use the fowllowing (optional) placeholders:
- "[basename]" (no dot) - "[languagecode]" (no dot) - "[extension]" (dot excluded) - "[optionaldefaulttypes]" (dot included)
e.g. "[basename][optionaldefaulttypes].[languagecode].[extension]"

data.name: SR_toolTipItem6Text
data.value:
Use the fowllowing (optional) placeholders:
- "[basename]" (no dot) - "[languagecode]" (no dot) - "[extension]" (dot excluded) - "[optionaldefaulttypes]" (dot included)
e.g. "[basename][optionaldefaulttypes].[extension]"
